attributes.action: Overhaul the UK's foreign aid commitments as administered through  DfID.
attributes.background:
The UK's target is to spend 0.7 per cent of national income on aid.  Consequently, colossal sums are blithely given away for which there is no accountability or proper management - some £12 BILLION is available.
The system is broke - we must accept the blame if we do nothing to fix it.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to change the way in which foreign aid is administered.
